main event: A witness reported seeing a bright light moving rapidly across the sky, along with other observations of unidentified flying objects over a period surrounding October 22, 1960.
interesting points: The object initially appeared as a balloon-shaped white trail that changed shape,The sighting lasted several minutes and involved discussions between the witness and his wife,There was a mention of a bright light with a flaming red light at the rear of a cigar-shaped object,Several witnesses observed similar unidentified objects in the Shreveport area at the same time,Descriptions of a luminous mass of light hovering at a considerable altitude were included in different reports.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects, including a balloon-shaped white trail and a cigar-shaped object with a flaming red light
witness description: a husband and wife observed the phenomena together
